query: Q33. You created a meeting for next Tuesday at 2 PM, and several invitees have accepted. How do you change the meeting so it will begin at 1 PM and last for one hour?
code:
A. Open the calendar in Day, Week, or Work Week view. Drag the start time to 1 PM and send an update
B. Double click the meeting to open it, change the start time to 1 PM abd send an update
C. Some people have already accepted, so you must cancel this meeting and create a new meeting
options:
B
 C
 A or B
 A

query: Q34. What permission allows your delegates to read, create, change, and delete items that they create, but not items that you created?
options:
Reader
 Author

 Editor

query: Q35. Why might you create an additional contacts folder?
options:
To store contacts to share with colleagues
 To avoid exceeding 500 contacts per folder limit
 To make it faster to search for your contacts
 All of these answers

query: Q37. When accepting a meeting invitation, what happens if you click "Do not send a response"?

 The meeting organizer will not receive an email with your response, and your response will not be recorded

query: Q45. While using Focused Inbox, you notice that Outlook sometimes puts important messages from a specific customer on th Another tab. How do you fix this for future messages?

 Locate that customer in the People Hub and select the Focused check box.

query: Q52. You are inviting five members of your executive staff to an offsite retreat. You need to ensure that they do not share the invitation with others. What should you do before sending the email?
options:
Include the text "No Forward" in the Bcc field.
 Turn off the Allow Forwarding option.
 Prefix the email subject with "FWD OFF".
 Turn on the No Forwarding option.

query: Q55. A meeting reminder showed up and you accidently closed it. What is the best way to bring back the reminder when in Calendar view?
options:
Right-click the meeting in the Calendar and select Reminders Window.
 Close and reopen Outlook

 On Windows, on the View tab, click Reminders Window. On Mac, click Windows > Reminders.

query: Q56. You received an email from someone and want to find other emails from this person. Witch method is not a way to see those emails across all folders?
options:
Highlight the email in the viewing pane and sort by From,
 Enter the person's email address into the search box.
 On the Folder tab, click New Search Folder and select Mail from specific people.
 Right-click the email and select Find Related > Messages from sender.

query: Q57. What does the ignore button allow you to do?

query: Q66. You accidentally delete an email from your inbox. How can you retrieve the deleted email?
